definition: semifeudal and semicolonial (the official Marxist description of China in the late Qing and under the Guomindang)
pinyin: ban4 feng1 jian4 ban4 zhi2 min2 di4

sentences.english: Brita in grant her colony independence in the year after the second world war.
sentences.chinese: 二進制戰後的年代理英國准許其殖民地獨立。

sentences.english: Descended in part from Inca colonists sent here more than 500 years ago, the inhabitants of Taquile keep the old ways.
sentences.chinese: 部分居民是五百年前殖民者的後裔。

sentences.english: A self-governing colony of denmark on the faro e islands.
sentences.chinese: 法羅羣島上的自治丹麥殖民地。

sentences.english: In 1814, Malta became a part of the British Empire.
sentences.chinese: 1814年，馬耳他島淪爲大英帝國的殖民地。

sentences.english: The same is very much the case in Africa's fragile post-colonial nations.
sentences.chinese: 這一點，對於非洲廣大後殖民地國家來說，同樣如此。

sentences.english: Build a Settlement on your plateau and bring Kalkas to Thessaly.
sentences.chinese: 在高原建立殖民，把卡爾加帶到狄瑟利。

sentences.english: In colonial days in America, children rolled hoops along the streets, guiding them with sticks.
sentences.chinese: 在殖民時代的美國，孩子們沿街用木棍引導滾圈玩耍。

sentences.english: This is the home of Plymouth Colony, first settled in 1620;
sentences.chinese: 於1620年開始在這兒建立普利茅斯殖民地。

sentences.english: It is the result of global non-colonization movement to confirm the collective human rights.
sentences.chinese: 對集體人權的確認，是全球性非殖民化運動的結果。

sentences.english: The colonialists tried in vain to crack down on( upon) that country's economy.
sentences.chinese: 殖民主義者妄圖扼殺那個國家的經濟。

sentences.english: Japan’s aim is the colonization of China, a really grandiose plan.
sentences.chinese: 日本的目標是中國的殖民化，這是個極其宏大的計劃。

sentences.english: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.
sentences.chinese: 殖民者慘絕人寰地屠殺了成千的土著居民。

sentences.english: In 1960, Britain granted independence to the crown colony of Cyprus.
sentences.chinese: 在1960年，英國承認其殖民地賽普勒斯的獨立。

sentences.english: In the colonies outside New England, no strict theocracies had been set up.
sentences.chinese: 新英格蘭以外的殖民地並沒有實行嚴格的神權統治。

sentences.english: Who is the assassin who appears to be stalking Roslin in "Colonial Day"?
sentences.chinese: 誰是在殖民地日接近羅斯林的暗殺者？

sentences.english: To answer this question we must first understand the concept of decolonization .
sentences.chinese: 回答這個問題前首先要弄清殖民這個概念。
